胳肢窩.definition: armpit; also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]; also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]

胳膊擰不過大腿.pinyin: ge1 bo5 ning3 bu5 guo4 da4 tui3
胳膊擰不過大腿.definition: (idiom) the weak cannot overcome the strong

胳膊肘往外拐.pinyin: ge1 bo5 zhou3 wang3 wai4 guai3
胳膊肘往外拐.definition: see 胳膊肘朝外拐[ge1 bo5 zhou3 chao2 wai4 guai3]

胳膊肘朝外拐.pinyin: ge1 bo5 zhou3 chao2 wai4 guai3
胳膊肘朝外拐.definition: lit. the elbow turns outward (idiom); fig. to side with outsiders rather than one's own people

胳臂.definition: arm; CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]; also pr. [ge1 bi4]
